resources.string: This application is project for class Programming mobile applications, on FTN in Čačak. Creator of this app is Kristina Milanović , index 92/2020.The world of fine wines is a realm of luxury and exclusivity, where each bottle represents the culmination of centuries of viticultural expertise. Among them, the Romanée-Conti Domaine de la Romanée-Conti stands as a symbol of prestige, commanding a staggering $22,000 per bottle, known for its exquisite Pinot Noir. The Screaming Eagle Cabernet Sauvignon is another prized gem, celebrated for its rich flavors and a price tag of $6,500 per bottle. These wines, like Penfolds Grange Hermitage, Chateau Lafite Rothschild, and Petrus, represent the pinnacle of oenological craftsmanship, where every sip offers a glimpse into the artistry of winemaking and a taste of unparalleled luxury.

Ova aplikacija je rađena u okviru predmeta Programiranje mobilnih aplikacija, na FTN u Čačku. Kreator ove aplikacije je Kristina Milanović, indeksa 92/2020. Svet vrhunskih vina je oblast luksuza i ekskluzivnosti, gde svaka boca predstavlja krunu vekovnog vinogradarskog iskustva. Među njima, Romanée-Conti Domaine de la Romanée-Conti stoji kao simbol prestiža, sa cijenom od čak 22.000 dolara po boci, poznato po svom izvanrednom Pinot Noiru. Screaming Eagle Cabernet Sauvignon je još jedan dragulj, slavljen zbog bogatih aroma i cijene od 6.500 dolara po boci. Ova vina, poput Penfolds Grange Hermitage, Chateau Lafite Rothschild i Petrus, predstavljaju vrhunac vinogradarske vještine, gdje svaki gutljaj pruža uvid u umjetnost pravljenja vina i okus neusporedivog luksuza.
